game.name: Crypt Custodian
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Crypt Custodian은 사후 세계를 깨끗하게 청소하는 매혹적인 메트로바니아 게임입니다. 사후 '영원히' 저승의 청소부로 임명되어 버린 장난꾸러기 고양이 '플루토'가 되어 보세요. 유령들과 어울리고, 짐승들과 대결을 펼치며, 광활한 저승 풍경을 탐험할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crypt Custodian is a charming metroidvania about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto - a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworld's janitor... FOREVER! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.
game.publishers: Kyle Thompson, Top Hat Studios, Inc., H2 Interactive Co., Ltd.
